Name: Shabti of Panefery
Description: The mummiform shabti wears a plain wig and a plaited ceremonial beard. The arms are crossed right over left; the left hand holds a pick, the right hand a hoe and a rope with a bag across the left shoulder. The statuette is provided with a pedestal and a back pillar continuing to the bottom of the wig. The text is on the back pillar.The modelling is relatively good.
